MS.S: ChangelogManagement is a PowerShell module for reading and manipulating changelog files in [Keep a Changelog 1.0.0](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/) format._x000A__x000A_The primary feature is automatic updating of changelogs at release time in a CI/CD workflow via Update-Changelog._x000A__x000A_Other features include:_x000A__x000A_- Creating new changelog files via New-Changelog_x000A_- Adding data to changelog files via Add-ChangelogData_x000A_- Getting changelog contents (parsed into a PowerShell object) via Get-ChangelogData_x000A_- Converting changelogs into other formats via ConvertFrom-Changelog

### Added_x000A_- Get-ChangelogData now returns an additional `ChangeCount` property on `Unreleased` and `Released` properties. `ChangeCount` contains an integer count of the number of changes in that section. (Note that counts for individual change types in a section are available via `$OutputVariable.SECTION-NAME-HERE.Data.CHANGE-TYPE-HERE.Count` syntax.)_x000A__x000A_### Changed_x000A_- Pester test structure modernized and updated to offer increased coverage and more test cases_x000A__x000A_### Fixed_x000A_- Now documented that AzureDevOps option for Update-Changelog's LinkMode requires default branch be main

ChangelogManagement is a PowerShell module for reading and manipulating changelog files in [Keep a Changelog 1.0.0](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/) format._x000A__x000A_The primary feature is automatic updating of changelogs at release time in a CI/CD workflow via Update-Changelog._x000A__x000A_Other features include:_x000A__x000A_- Creating new changelog files via New-Changelog_x000A_- Adding data to changelog files via Add-ChangelogData_x000A_- Getting changelog contents (parsed into a PowerShell object) via Get-ChangelogData_x000A_- Converting changelogs into other formats via ConvertFrom-Changelog

### Added_x000A_- Get-ChangelogData now returns an additional `ChangeCount` property on `Unreleased` and `Released` properties. `ChangeCount` contains an integer count of the number of changes in that section. (Note that counts for individual change types in a section are available via `$OutputVariable.SECTION-NAME-HERE.Data.CHANGE-TYPE-HERE.Count` syntax.)_x000A__x000A_### Changed_x000A_- Pester test structure modernized and updated to offer increased coverage and more test cases_x000A__x000A_### Fixed_x000A_- Now documented that AzureDevOps option for Update-Changelog's LinkMode requires default branch be main
